name: Ajax's Spear
flavor-text: Useful for kicking Hector's bitch ass.

name: Baha's Bigger Blaster
flavor-text: Giving you a leg up on the competition!

name: Bastard
flavor-text: TORGUE!  Bastard Guns for Bastard People!

name: Chimera
flavor-text: A beast of many forms - Fire, Lightning, and Poison

name: Crux
flavor-text: Cross their heart, hope they die.

name: Cyclops
flavor-text: I have you in my eye, sir.

name: Defender
flavor-text: I can do this all day...

name: Glob Gun / Splat Gun / Rolling Spatter Gun
flavor-text: I think you have something on your shoe. / For when you want to splat something / Splat! Sploch! Spluch!

name: Lightning
flavor-text: I feel like I'm gonna break this thing.

name: Mug Shot
flavor-text: Does your face hurt? It's killin' me...

name: Orion
flavor-text: A hunter lives among the stars...

name: Patton
flavor-text: May God have mercy upon my enemies, because I won't.

name: Protector
flavor-text: Ammo is no longer an issue.

name: Raven
flavor-text: 2 more bullets make all the difference

name: Revolution
flavor-text: Guns of the Revolution will never fall silent!

name: Rider
flavor-text: Careful... you might put someone's eye out.

name: Stalker
flavor-text: You can run, but you can't hide.

name: Stampeding Spatter
flavor-text: For when you want to splat the living shit out of something.

name: The Blister
drop-sources: Like A Moth To Flame Quest

name: The Clipper
flavor-text: Don't drop it... might lose a toe.

name: The Spy
flavor-text: I spy with my little eye...

name: Thunder Storm
flavor-text: Lightning never strike the same place twice, but it can strike freaking everywhere!

name: Whitting's Elephant Gun
flavor-text: Why don't you go shoot yourself an elephant?
